name: Music on: Drums
synopsis: The definitive beatbox for creating songs and rhythms! With a library of 160 sounds, use your creative skills to assign them to each of the 8 tracks available per pattern, activate or deactivate each of the 16 steps that make up a track using the buttons or the stylus, and combine the 8 patterns to compose up to 64 songs. Like a professional DJ, create and play in real time! "Music on: Drums" includes a pre-recorded Song.
